TEXT: When a card enters or leaves your hand, increase this by #b1. At the start of your turn, decrease this by #b15.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least #b30 #yWind #ySpeed, gain #b1 #yFlight and change this into #yThe #yWind #yof #yWarfare.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least #b30 #yWind #ySpeed, gain #b1 #yStrength and change this into #yThe #yWind #yof #yResistance.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least #b30 #yWind #ySpeed, gain #b15 #yBlock and change this into #yThe #yWind #yof #yHealing.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least #b30 #yWind #ySpeed, gain #b5 #yTemporary #yHP and change this into #yThe #yWind #yof #ySoaring.
